### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler(position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(40.0, -82.0)
Consists of 
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) 
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) 
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) 
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) 
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) 
- Chests at positions (43.5, -82.5), (40.5, -80.5), (43.5, -81.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Inserter system at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of 
- Burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)) 
- Chest at position (2.5, 0.5) 
- Small electric pole at position (2.5, 1.5)

### Inserter system at position(0.5, 3.5)
Consists of 
- Burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) 
- Chest at position (0.5, 2.5)

### Inserter and chest system at position(0.5, 2.5)
Consists of 
- Chest at position (0.5, 2.5) 
- Chest at position (2.5, 0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment but being out of fuel
- Ensure you have enough fuel in your burner equipment before using it
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your furnace before attempting to smelt
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
- Ensure you have a liquid input connected to your steam engine before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid present in connections
- Ensure you have a fluid connection to your offshore pump before using it
### Errors when using generator but not being connected
- Ensure your generator is connected to a power network before using it
### Errors when using pipe group but having empty or full output status
- Ensure your pipe group is properly connected and has the required fluid before using it
